## Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and
## files generated by popular Visual Studio add-ons.

# Build results
[Bb]in/
[Oo]bj/
[Ll]og/
[Ll]ogs/

# User-specific files
*.user
*.userosscache
*.suo
*.sln.docstates
*.userprefs

# Visual Studio
.vs/
*.dbmdl
*.dbproj.schemaview
*.pdb
*.cachefile
*.VC.db
*.VC.VC.opendb
*.psess
*.vsp
*.vspx
*.ncb
*.opendb
*.sdf
*.sqlite
*.vscode/

# Rider
.idea/
*.sln.iml

# Build results (for MAUI / Xamarin)
*.apk
*.aab
*.ap_
*.ipa
*.xcuserstate
*.xcuserdatad
*.xcworkspace
*.xcodeproj/*
!*.xcodeproj/project.pbxproj

# MAUI platform-specific artifacts
**/Platforms/Android/obj/
**/Platforms/Android/bin/
**/Platforms/iOS/obj/
**/Platforms/iOS/bin/
**/Platforms/MacCatalyst/obj/
**/Platforms/MacCatalyst/bin/
**/Platforms/Windows/obj/
**/Platforms/Windows/bin/

# Generated code
*.g.*
*.generated.*
*.designer.*
*.i.*

# Backup & temporary files
*.bak
*.tmp
*.temp
*.swp
*.swm
*.swn
*.swo
*.orig

# NuGet
*.nupkg
*.snupkg
*.nuspec
*.nuget.props
*.nuget.targets
packages/
**/packages/*
!.nuget/
.nuget/
project.lock.json
project.fragment.lock.json
artifacts/

# JetBrains Rider
.idea/
*.sln.iml

# macOS files
.DS_Store
.AppleDouble
.LSOverride

# Windows image cache
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db
Desktop.ini

# VS Code
.vscode/
.history/

# Resharper
_ReSharper*/
*.[Rr]e[Ss]harper
*.DotSettings.user

# Templating
~$*

# Publish
publish/
AppPackages/
BundleArtifacts/
Package.StoreAssociation.xml
_app_packages/
_app_symbols/

# Maui Essentials
*.keystore
*.jks
*.p12
*.mobileprovision
*.cer

# Crashlytics / Google Services
google-services.json
GoogleService-Info.plist

# Environment-specific settings
.env
.env.*

# Test results
TestResult.xml
TestResults/
*.coverage
*.coveragexml

# Other
*.tlog
*.lastbuildstate
*.ilk
*.meta
